turns.content:
"Like many of us, I have fears. I'm afraid of failing, of not being good enough, of not living up to others' expectations. But despite these fears, I've made the decision to pursue my passion for 3D motion design.

It's not always easy and I'm definitely not perfect. In fact, I make plenty of mistakes along the way. But my experience as a product manager has taught me the value of hard work and a willingness to learn from my mistakes. These skills have helped me to overcome my fears and continue pursuing my dreams.

I'm not a super star in the field yet and I still have a lot to learn. But I'm dedicated to continuing my journey in 3D motion design and seeing where it takes me. It's a vulnerable and challenging process, but I'm excited for the opportunity to grow and learn.

Don't let fear hold you back from pursuing your passions. Embrace imperfection and take the leap. You never know where it will take you."

add to the second part the sentence that this fear didn't allow me finish the 3d motion design video which I was doing on course in 2020. But anyway I learned all the skills I needed in pipeline - idea, moodboard, work with references, blocking, lighinth and work with materials, compositing

"Like many of us, I have fears. I'm afraid of failing, of not being good enough, of not living up to others' expectations. And these fears almost held me back from completing a 3D motion design video that I was working on as part of a course in 2020. But despite these fears, I made the decision to face them and continue pursuing my passion for 3D motion design.

It's not always easy and I'm definitely not perfect. In fact, I make plenty of mistakes along the way. But my experience as a product manager has taught me the value of hard work and a willingness to learn from my mistakes. These skills have helped me to overcome my fears and continue pursuing my dreams.

I learned all the skills I needed in the pipeline - from coming up with ideas and creating mood boards to blocking, lighting, and working with materials and compositing. It was a challenging process, but I'm grateful for the opportunity to learn and grow.

I'm not a super star in the field yet and I still have a lot to learn. But I'm dedicated to continuing my journey in 3D motion design and seeing where it takes me. It's a vulnerable and challenging process, but I'm excited for the opportunity to grow and learn.

Don't let fear hold you back from pursuing your passions. Embrace imperfection and take the leap. You never know where it will take you."
Start with that: I have fears. I'm afraid of failing, of not being good enough, of not living up to my expectations.

"I have fears. I'm afraid of failing, of not being good enough, of not living up to my expectations. These fears can be overwhelming and hold me back from pursuing my passions and trying new things. But I've learned that the only way to truly succeed is to embrace imperfection and take the leap.

I know I'm not perfect and I will make mistakes along the way. But my experience as a product manager has taught me the value of hard work and a willingness to learn from my mistakes. These skills have helped me to overcome my fears and continue pursuing my dreams, including 3D motion design.

I'm not a super star in the field yet and I still have a lot to learn. But I'm dedicated to continuing my journey in 3D motion design and seeing where it takes me. It's a vulnerable and challenging process, but I'm excited for the opportunity to grow and learn.

Don't let fear hold you back from pursuing your passions. Embrace imperfection and take the leap. You never know where it will take you."

It's not always easy and I'm definitely not perfect at this approach. But my experience as a product manager has taught me the value of hard work and a willingness to learn from my mistakes. These skills have helped me to overcome my fears and continue pursuing my dreams.

"As a creative director in the world of 3D motion design, I know firsthand the power of fear. I've been afraid of failing, of not being good enough, of not living up to my own expectations. These fears almost held me back from completing a 3D motion design video that I was working on as part of a course in 2020. But despite these fears, I made the decision to face them and continue pursuing my passion for this field.

It's not always easy and I'm definitely not perfect in this approach. But my experience as a product manager has taught me the value of hard work and a willingness to learn from my mistakes. These skills have helped me to overcome my fears and continue pursuing my dreams.

On the course, I learned all the skills I needed in the pipeline - from coming up with ideas and creating mood boards to blocking, lighting, and working with materials and compositing. It was a challenging process, but I'm grateful for the opportunity to learn and grow.

I still have a lot to learn and explore in the world of 3D motion design. But I'm dedicated to continuing my journey and seeing where it takes me. It's a challenging and exciting process, and I can't wait to see what the future holds.

To all my fellow creatives out there, don't let fear hold you back from pursuing your passions. Embrace imperfection and take the leap. You never know where it will take you."
